TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed X509NameType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of name the X509 certificate contains.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The name type can be a simple name, an email address, a User Principal Name (UPN), a Domain Name System (DNS) name or a URL. An X509 certificate can have one or more of these names. You can obtain the name of a certificate using the method <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.GetNameInfo%2A>.
## Examples The following example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. The example then writes certificate information to the console.
[!code-vb[CertSelect#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.security.crypto_112_1.vb)] [!code-cs[CertSelect#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.security.crypto_112_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[CertSelect#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.security.crypto_112_1.cpp)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509NameType DnsFromAlternativeName = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The DNS name associated with the alternative name of either the subject or the issuer of an X.509 certificate. This value is equivalent to the DnsName value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509NameType DnsName = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The DNS name associated with the alternative name of either the subject or issuer of an X509 certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509NameType EmailName = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The email address of the subject or issuer associated of an X509 certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509NameType SimpleName = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The simple name of a subject or issuer of an X509 certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509NameType UpnName = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The UPN name of the subject or issuer of an X509 certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509NameType UrlName = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The URL address associated with the alternative name of either the subject or issuer of an X509 certificate.
